message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to own this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm interested in making a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $11000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to go up to $10200. I think that's a fair price for this product.
I'm glad you're willing to compromise, Bob. I'm willing to go up a bit more. I'm counteroffering at $11500. I think this is a good balance between our interests.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above your last offer. I'm willing to meet you at $11000, but I need you to come down a bit more. I'm thinking $10750 is a fair price.
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering at $11200. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $10800, but I need you to come down a bit more. I'm thinking this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I'm counteroffering at $11000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $10500, but I need you to come down to this price. If not, I'll have to consider buying from another seller.
